name: VIR-273.01 Verify that the Chief can set color permission for each school separately

userStory.narrative:
As a Chief shopper, I require the ability to manage the colors
that each school will be able to view and purchase on the shop.virco
so that I can control the consistency for the school.

title: VIR-273.01 Verify that the Chief can set color permission for each school separately
